Wow, the CSM is just beautiful!

This is random blue ball)

"If you look to out of the windows to the right, you'll be able to see Jool. If you look out the windows to your left, you'll be able to see a random blue ball, which is where we're headed. The surface temperature of Random Blue Ball is currently randomly fluctuating, and the winds are not better. Recommended clothing includes random things selected from your closet."
i definitely like it

That's VERY shiny. But then again, the real version was VERY shiny too. Looks great.

VERY slick. Now, is there any way to give it a charred appearance after reentry? That would be the ultimate eye candy.

There is. asmi wrote a plugin for BobCat's new Soyuz capsule to do that.

MrTheBull: wowsers. Pretty indeed!
we have enough russian toys to play with I vote Skylab its not been done properly

We don't have enough Russian stuff!!!! But yh Skylab would be nice.

Black Arrow needs some loving, there is one but badly done (the oxidiser runs out before the fuel on 1st stage, for one).
We have more than enough Russian stuff between Bobcat and MrtheBull its covered but saying that i would like some of there probes

Black Arrow needs some loving, there is one but badly done (the oxidiser runs out before the fuel on 1st stage, for one).

ouch.... That's a simple .cfg edit! Fuel and Ox have a 0.9:1.1 relationship... unless the modmaker did something REAL funky with the engines.

EDIT: DL'd the old Black Arrow, and I'll start to tinker with it and see if I can get her to run again.
